author: Adesola Ayo-Aderele
title: Queen Elizabeth offers to pay you N12m a year to tweet for her
text:
Tweet 
If you’re sick of your crap boss lording it over you then maybe it’s time for a change of scenery. 
Rather than having to suck up to someone who commands no respect, you should be working for someone who was born to rule. Someone with a solid brand. Someone…like the Queen. 
And now you can. 
Because her Majesty is now recruiting for a seasoned social media user to run her personal Twitter account. 
The job vacancy, which has been posted on her official website says that she’s looking for a new ‘digital communications officer’ to join her ‘fast-paced’ team. 
It’s a full-time role which is offering £30,000 a year and will involve the running of the royal Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and YouTube channels. 
Your job will be to write posts about her work – documenting state visits, award ceremonies and various Royal engagements. 
‘It’s knowing your content will be viewed by millions,’ the advert says. 
‘It’s finding new ways to maintain The Queen’s presence in the public eye and on the world stage. 
‘This is what makes working for the Royal Household exceptional.’ 
The post, which is a maternity cover role, says that the biggest reward that it offers is the knowledge of having your work shared around the world. 
The Queen has only ever tweeted once, back in 2014 when she wrote about the opening of an exhibition at the London Science Museum. 
It read: ‘It is a pleasure to open the Information Age exhibition today at the @ScienceMuseum and I hope people will enjoy visiting. Elizabeth R.’ 
To apply, just visit the Royal Household’s website . 
So…what are you waiting for? 
Source: Mirror
